thread.section_title: Zodee Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Zodee | zodee.com.au
thread.title: JENNY

author: JENNY
title: JENNY
text: I ordered and paid for products from Zodee but received a follow up email to say the items I ordered were out of stock. I had not bought from Zodee before but took the chance and rather than asking for a refund, chose to wait for the products to come back into stock. It took a couple of months but just as I was beginning to think I'd made a mistake trusting that they would turn up, the products arrived. Well done Zodee. I'm now about to re-order for both myself and a friend and have recommended your company to a number of other friends. And the products .... pantyhose by Levante in a shade I have been unable to source in Sydney, are great!
